title: Rachel Caine - Morganville Vampires, Weather Warden plus
description:
The Morganville Vampires - Books 1-11 all narrated by Cynthia Holloway

The Morganville Vampires is a series of young adult urban fantasy/vampire novels written by Rachel Caine. The novels feature Claire Danvers, a student at Texas Prairie University, and her housemates in the vampire-controlled city of Morganville, Texas. While the mayor of Morganville is human, unbeknownst to most of the population the town is actually run in cooperation with a group of vampires

1 Glass Houses (October 2006)
2 The Dead Girls' Dance (April 2007)
3 Midnight Alley (October 2007)
4 Feast of Fools (June 2008)
5 Lord of Misrule (January 2009)
6 Carpe Corpus (June 2009)
7 Fade Out (November 2009)
8 Kiss of Death (April 2010)
9 Ghost Town (October 2010)
10 Bite Club (May 2011)
11 Last Breath (November 2011)


Weather Warden Books 1-9


Joanne Baldwin is a Weather Warden, part of an organization that rents space from the UN. Their mission is supposed to be alleviating natural disasters before millions of people die. Joanne shows up on the run, in her hot Mustang Delilah, from a murder of which she has been accused; she thinks if she can find Lewis Orwell, with all three Warden capabilitiesÃ¢â‚¬â€Earth, Fire, and WeatherÃ¢â‚¬â€who is in hiding, she can get help. Lewis' last known action among the Wardens was to steal three bottles containing Djinn, the supernatural beings many of which partner with Wardens to do their work. Her life becomes one huge complication as she learns a lot of truths people don't want her to know.


1 Ill Wind (December 2003)
2 Heat Stroke (August 2004)
3 Chill Factor (January 2005)
4 Windfall (November 2005)
5 Firestorm (September 2006)
6 Thin Air (August 2007)
7 Gale Force (August 2008)
8 Cape Storm (August 2009)
9 Total Eclipse (August 2010)

Misc. Books

Outcast Season 01 - Undone

This series is a spin-off of the Weather Warden series, and will follow the story of a Djinn who's been cut off from her fellows, and must rely on the goodwill of a Warden partner for her very existence. Along the way, she has to face enemies and challenges that the Djinn can't, or won't face themselves.

Revivalist 01 - Working Stiff

Bryn Davis was killed on the job after discovering her bosses were selling a drug designed to resurrect the dead. Now, revived by that same drug, she becomes an undead soldier in a corporate war to take down the very pharmaceutical company responsible for her new condition.... 

None of these files are my rips - I am re-upping only because I didn't find them on any of my current torrent searches.  My thanks to the original uploaders.

Please seed and enjoy!  :)
